member_organisations: KWVD has approx. 150 members from Germany and abroad. Our members are: firms, organisations, private persons etc.
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives:
KWVD adopted Europe 2020 strategy and we try to achieve it's goals in our everyday work:  
1. Employment 
2. Research and Technology 
3. Climate change and energy sustainability 
4. Education 
5. Fighting poverty and social exclusion
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
KWVD is a member of: 
1. BNI-Business Network International http://www.bni.de/ 
 
2. BVMW-The German Association for Small and Medium-3. sized Businesses http://www.bvmw.de/home.html 
 
3. Vereinigung der hessischen Unternehmerverbände e. V. 
 http://vhu.de/vhu/home/startseite.de.html
relevant_communication:
KWVD participated in KAUSA initiative which includes stakeholders relevant for company training and for supporting self-employed and young people with an immigrant background. From 2009-2012 KWVD implemented project "KWVD pro Ausbildung". Both activities are part of JOBSTARTER Programe funded by German Federal Ministry of Education and Research and European Social Fund. KWVD actively participates in implementation of project's funded by Erasmus+,  
the EU programme for Education, Training, Youth and Sport for 2014-2020.  
Events: Business days, Spring day and Summer day for members, Mozaik business events, economic seminars etc.  
Publications: Cronnect-entrepreneur magazine
goals__remit:
Kroatische Wirtschaftsvereinigung eV (KWVD) is an economic organization founded in 2007 in Frankfurt am Main, with the aim to represent the companies operating in the German-Croatian economic area and to promote the German-Croatian economic relations. KWVD organizes economic conventions, match making and informative events, seminars, fairs for firms and entrepreneurs. 
KWVD is actively involved in education by organizing training courses and practices for pupils and students. KWVD is also active in  adult education by organising professional seminars for  teaching / non-teaching staff.  Our projects involve pupils an students from Germany and from abroad, students with an immigrant background.
